abstract.text: Discover how AVCapture and PhotoKit can help you create more responsive and delightful apps. Learn about the camera capture process and find out how deferred photo processing can help create the best quality photo. We‚Äôll show you how zero shutter lag uses time travel to capture the perfect action photo, dive into building a responsive capture pipeline, and share how you can adopt the Video Effects API to recognize pre-defined gestures that trigger real-time video effects.

metadata.title: Create a more responsive camera experience

abstract.text: Session notes shared by the community for the community.

doc://WWDCNotes/documentation/WWDCNotes/.title: Handle the Limited Photos Library in your app

abstract.text: Access the photos and videos you need for your app while preserving privacy. With the new Limited Photos Library feature, people can directly control which photos and videos an app can access to protect their private content. We‚Äôll explore how this feature may affect your app, and take you through alternatives like PHPicker.
Xcode 15, Swift 5.9, iOS 17, macOS 14 (Sonoma), tvOS 17, visionOS 1, watchOS 10.
